hero.tagline2: responsive web experiences with modern technologies

about.heading: About Me
about.text: I'm a passionate Frontend Developer with 2+ years of experience creating responsive web applications. I specialize in Next.js, React, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks to deliver great user experiences.
about.journey: My journey in web development started with a curiosity for how things work on the internet. Today, I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and staying up-to-date with the latest web technologies and best practices.

skills.heading: Skills & Technologies
skills.intro: Here are the technologies I work with to create amazing web experiences

projects.heading: Featured Projects
projects.intro: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and expertise
projects.description2: Full-stack Digital Agency website · Next.js · TypeScript · Tailwindcss

contact.heading: Get In Touch
contact.intro: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and interesting projects
contact.paragraph: I'm currently looking for new opportunities and interesting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hello, I'll try my best to get back to you!
